description: This is a Java interface defining a repository for Invoice entities, extending JpaRepository. It includes method signatures for retrieving invoices based on partner, invoice number, status, due date, and deletion status.

classes.name: InvoiceRepository
classes.description: A Spring Data JPA repository interface for Invoice entities, providing custom query methods.

methods.name: findByPartnerAndDeletedFalse
methods.description: Retrieves a list of Invoices associated with a specific Partner that are not marked as deleted.

methods.name: findByPartnerAndInvoiceNumber
methods.description: Finds an Invoice by Partner and invoice number, returning an Optional.

methods.name: findByPartnerAndStatusAndDeletedFalse
methods.description: Retrieves a list of Invoices for a Partner with a specific status that are not marked as deleted.

methods.name: findByPartnerAndDueDateBeforeAndDeletedFalse
methods.description: Retrieves a list of Invoices for a Partner with a due date before a specified date, not marked as deleted.
